"set this.say1 to Already nearly insensible from your other wounds, your mind is overwhelmed by a final, vast and blinding pain. You barely remember your body sinking to the floor ... :: set this.say1a to Some unknown time later, you return to something vaguely resembling consciousness. Small mammals seem to have been nesting in your mouth, and your eyes are almost glued shut by dried mucus. Your joints are stiff. Your nose stings from harsh smells. :: set this.say1b to Exploring with your hands, you discover that wide strips of linen are wrapped tightly around your otherwise naked body. You gather enough strength to roll over -- and immediately fall several feet off a wooden rack to a cold stone floor ... :: set this.say1c to After another period of insensibility, you slowly recover your wits, stagger to your feet and look at your surroundings."

"set this.say2 to \$brief(this) sustains a mortal wound! He staggers backward, stumbles and sinks to the floor with a final gasp of agony. :: set this.say2a to An eerie quiet falls upon the room as the realization dawns that \$brief(this) is dead. :: set this.say2b to The silence is broken by a soft voice whispering, \\"Excuse me.\\" You turn to see Lith standing beside a gurney. After curtsying to you, she gently gathers up the corpse of \$brief(this), places it on the gurney and draws a white sheet over the body. :: set this.say2c to With a final curtsy, Lith and her gurney disappear into the depths of the Castle."

"action for this \$prop(this.say1)\|\$prop(this.say2) :: action for this \$prop(this.say1a)\|\$prop(this.say2a) :: action for this \$prop(this.say1b)\|\$prop(this.say2b) :: action for this \$prop(this.say1c)\|\$prop(this.say2c) :: teleport silently this to \$lookup(Marrach:rooms:outer:dungeon:NecromanticWorkshop) :: set this.wtemp to \$lookup(Marrach:Starting:UrWrap) :: create silently \$prop(this.wtemp) in this :: fill #junk in this with this(Marrach:Starting:UrWrap) :: set this.wtemp to \$element(this,#junk,1) :: wear \$obj(this.wtemp) :: empty #junk in this"

"set this.say1 to [You are now in the Catacombs awaiting resurrection. Lith will arrive in EIGHT REAL-TIME HOURS to transport your body to your room in the Outer Bailey. Until that time, you will be unable to leave the Catacombs or communicate with any other Guest.] :: set this.say1a to [You may log off if you wish; if you return after the waiting period has expired, Lith will appear within a few minutes.] :: set this.say2 to The east door opens softly, and Lith enters with her gurney. She curtsies shyly, places a linen-wrapped body on one of the wooden racks, curtsies again and quickly departs, locking the door firmly behind her. :: set this.say2a to The body struggles, mumbles and rolls off the rack with a crash. After a long minute, the body staggers to its feet. :: action for this \$prop(this.say1)\|\$prop(this.say2) :: action for this \$prop(this.say1a)\|\$prop(this.say2a) :: call bilbo:react:descsub"

"set this.death-abort to nil :: set this.say1 to The east door opens, and Lith enters with her gurney. She curtsies shyly and helps you onto the creaky vehicle, pulling a white sheet up to your chin. :: set this.say1a to You are vaguely aware of the gurney bumping along cold, dark passages, winding its way upward ... :: set this.say2 to The east door opens, and Lith enters with her gurney. She curtsies shyly and helps \$brief(this) onto the creaky vehicle, pulling a white sheet up to \$prop(this.trait:possessive) chin. :: set this.say2a to With a final curtsy, Lith disappears once again, closing the door firmly behind her. :: action for this \$prop(this.say1)\|\$prop(this.say2) :: action for this \$prop(this.say1a)\|\$prop(this.say2a) :: set this.trait:dead to nil :: call bilbo:react:descsub"

"set this.say1 to After a time, Lith helps you off the gurney, and you stand swaying in your old familiar room. :: set this.say1a to With a final curtsy, Lith disappears once again into the depths of the Castle. :: set this.say2 to The door opens, and Lith enters with her gurney. She curtsies shyly, removes a white sheet and helps \$brief(this) to \$prop(this.trait:possessive) feet. :: set this.say2a to With a final curtsy, Lith disappears once again into the depths of the Castle. :: action for this \$prop(this.say1)\|\$prop(this.say2) :: action for this \$prop(this.say1a)\|\$prop(this.say2a)"

"emit.actor Alas. As \$prop(this.hskillname), you are unable to treat \$prop(this.hwoundesc) wounds. \$brief(this) must seek a more experienced practitioner. :: goto 0720"
"fill #hstuff in this with actor(Generic:misc:bandage-sterile) :: set this.hmax to \$element(this,#hstuff,0) :: if \$prop(this.hmax) = nil then goto 0250"
"emit.actor You must be holding a sterile bandage to practice your skill as a Healer. :: goto 0720"

"set this.htemp to \$lookup(Generic:misc:bandage-bloody) :: create silently \$prop(this.htemp) in this :: empty #hstuff in this :: fill #hstuff in this with this(Generic:misc:bandage-bloody) :: set this.trait:bandage to \$element(this,#hstuff,1) :: wear \$obj(this.trait:bandage)"
"set this.trait:healing to true :: set this.trait:doctor to \$obj(actor) :: set this.trait:sickroom to \$env(this)"
"rem SAVE SCAR SIZE, CALC TREATMENT PERIOD"

"set this.trait:wound-size to \$prop(this.trait:wound-count) :: set this.trait:startheal to \$systime :: set this.trait:treatime to \$element(this.hdb,#treatment,\$prop(this.hlevel)) :: mul this.trait:treatime by 180 :: set this.trait:endtreat to \$prop(this.trait:treatime) :: add \$prop(this.trait:startheal) to this.trait:endtreat"

"set this.trait:healtime to \$element(this.hdb,#treatment,\$prop(this.hlevel)) :: mul this.trait:healtime by 86400 :: mul this.trait:healtime by \$prop(this.trait:wound-count) :: set this.trait:endheal to \$prop(this.startheal) :: add \$prop(this.trait:healtime) to this.trait:endheal"

"set this.trait:endsubheal to \$prop(this.trait:healtime) :: div this.trait:endsubheal by 3 :: mul this.trait:endsubheal by 2 :: add \$prop(this.trait:startheal) to this.trait:endsubheal :: goto 0390"
"set this.trait:endsubheal to \$prop(this.trait:healtime) :: div this.trait:endsubheal by 2 :: add \$prop(this.trait:startheal) to this.trait:endsubheal"

"emit.object \$obj(this) Gently applying a sterile bandage, \$brief(actor) begins to treat you. :: emit.audience Gently applying a sterile bandage, \$brief(actor) begins to treat \$brief(this). :: emit.actor Gently applying a sterile bandage, you begin to treat \$brief(this)."

"set this.htemp to \$element(this.hdb,#treatment,\$prop(this.hlevel)) :: set this.hsay1 to \$prop(this.htemp) :: mul this.hsay1 by 3 :: set this.hsay2 to \$prop(this.htemp) :: mul this.hsay2 by \$prop(this.trait:wound-count) :: emit.actor \
[As \$prop(this.hskillname), you must remain in the presence of your patient \$brief(this) for a treatment period of \$prop(this.hsay1) minutes. After the treatment period, \$brief(this) must wear \$prop(this.trait:possessive) bandage continuously for \$prop(this.hsay2) days for \$prop(this.trait:possessive) wound to heal properly. NOTE: You are responsible for informing your patient of this.]"

"if \$env(\$obj(this.trait:doctor)) \<\> nil then emit.object \$obj(this.trait:doctor) [The treatment period for \$brief(this) has been prematurely terminated. You did not remain in each other's presence for the required treatment period.]"

"slay obj.this.trait:bandage :: emit.object \$obj(this) The bandage on your wound unravels and disintegrates, as you are no longer in the healing presence of \$brief(this.trait:doctor). :: emit.audience The bandage on \$brief(this) unravels and disintegrates. :: goto 0700"

"if \$env(\$obj(this.trait:doctor)) \<\> nil then emit.object \$obj(this.trait:doctor) \
[The treatment period for \$brief(this) has ended. Either of you may now leave the treatment area. NOTE: You are responsible for informing your patient of this.]"
"set this.trait:endsubheal to \$prop(this.trait:endheal) :: set this.htemp to \$sam(\) :: set this.htemp to \$sam(\) :: set this.trait:woundname to slight :: goto 0540"

"set this.trait:endsubheal to \$prop(this.trait:healtime) :: div this.trait:endsubheal by 3 :: add \$prop(this.trait:startheal) to this.trait:endsubheal :: set this.htemp to \$sam(\) :: set this.htemp to \$sam(\) :: set this.trait:woundname to serious :: goto 0540"

"set this.trait:wound-size to 0 :: set this.hwoundesc to \$element(this.hdb,#scars,\$prop(this.trait:scar-count)) :: set this.trait:scarname to \$prop(this.hwoundesc) :: set this.htemp to \$sam(\) :: set this.htemp to \$sam(\) :: set this.htemp to \$sam(\)"
"emit.object \$obj(this) It occurs to you that your wound is feeling much better."

"set this.trait:healing to nil :: set this.trait:bandage to nil :: set this.trait:doctor to nil :: set this.trait:sickroom to nil :: set this.trait:startheal to nil :: set this.trait:endheal to nil :: set this.trait:endsubheal to nil :: set this.trait:healtime to nil :: set this.trait:subhealtime to nil :: set this.trait:endtreat to nil :: set this.trait:wound-size to nil :: set this.trait:treatime to nil :: call bilbo:react:descsub"

To \$lowercase(\$prop(this.skillverb)) this item, use the syntax: \$prop(this.skillverb) \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) \\"[trait] [value]\\". (Don't forget the quotes!) Example: \$prop(this.skillverb) \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) \\"\$prop(this.xtrait) \$prop(this.xvalue)\\""

If you die, everything you are carrying at the moment of death will fall to the floor for anyone to take, and everything you are wearing (including pouches and their entire contents) will be PERMANENTLY destroyed.]"

"set this.follow to nil :: set this.drag to nil :: set this.dragger to nil :: set this.wcnt to 1 :: empty #wstuff in this :: fill #wstuff in this with env.this(property volition \<\> nil) :: set this.wmax to \$element(this,#wstuff,0) :: if \$prop(this.wmax) \< 1 then goto 0240"

"set this.wcnt to 1 :: fill #wstuff in this with this() :: set this.wmax to \$element(this,#wstuff,0) :: if \$prop(this.wmax) \< 1 then goto 0320"
"set this.wtemp to \$element(this,#wstuff,\$prop(this.wcnt)) :: if \$obj(this.wtemp).base:clothing:worn \<\> nil then goto 0280"

"set this.say1 to Already nearly insensible from your other wounds, your mind is overwhelmed by a final, vast and blinding pain. You barely remember your body sinking to the floor ... :: set this.say1a to Some unknown time later, you return to something vaguely resembling consciousness. Small mammals seem to have been nesting in your mouth, and your eyes are almost glued shut by dried mucus. Your joints are stiff. Your nose stings from harsh smells. :: set this.say1b to Exploring with your hands, you discover that wide strips of linen are wrapped tightly around your otherwise naked body. You gather enough strength to roll over -- and immediately fall several feet off a wooden rack to a cold stone floor ... :: set this.say1c to After another period of insensibility, you slowly recover your wits, stagger to your feet and look at your surroundings."

"set this.say2 to \$brief(this) sustains a mortal wound! He staggers backward, stumbles and sinks to the floor with a final gasp of agony. :: set this.say2a to An eerie quiet falls upon the room as the realization dawns that \$brief(this) is dead. :: set this.say2b to The silence is broken by a soft voice whispering, \\"Excuse me.\\" You turn to see Lith standing beside a gurney. After curtsying to you, she gently gathers up the corpse of \$brief(this), places it on the gurney and draws a white sheet over the body. :: set this.say2c to With a final curtsy, Lith and her gurney disappear into the depths of the Castle."

"action for this \$prop(this.say1)\|\$prop(this.say2) :: action for this \$prop(this.say1a)\|\$prop(this.say2a) :: action for this \$prop(this.say1b)\|\$prop(this.say2b) :: action for this \$prop(this.say1c)\|\$prop(this.say2c) :: teleport silently this to \$lookup(Marrach:rooms:outer:dungeon:NecromanticWorkshop) :: set this.wtemp to \$lookup(Marrach:Starting:UrWrap) :: create silently \$prop(this.wtemp) in this :: fill #junk in this with this(Marrach:Starting:UrWrap) :: set this.wtemp to \$element(this,#junk,1) :: wear \$obj(this.wtemp) :: empty #junk in this"

"set this.say1 to [You are now in the Catacombs awaiting resurrection. Lith will arrive in EIGHT REAL-TIME HOURS to transport your body to your room in the Outer Bailey. Until that time, you will be unable to leave the Catacombs or communicate with any other Guest.] :: set this.say1a to [You may log off if you wish; if you return after the waiting period has expired, Lith will appear within a few minutes.] :: set this.say2 to The east door opens softly, and Lith enters with her gurney. She curtsies shyly, places a linen-wrapped body on one of the wooden racks, curtsies again and quickly departs, locking the door firmly behind her. :: set this.say2a to The body struggles, mumbles and rolls off the rack with a crash. After a long minute, the body staggers to its feet. :: action for this \$prop(this.say1)\|\$prop(this.say2) :: action for this \$prop(this.say1a)\|\$prop(this.say2a) :: call bilbo:react:descsub"

"set this.wwho to \$element(this.wlist,#members,\$prop(this.wcnt)) :: set this.wwho to \$lookup(\$prop(this.wwho)) :: if \$prop(this.wwho) = nil then goto 0430 else if \$env(this.wwho) = nil then goto 0430"

"emit.object \$obj(this.wwho) \
Suddenly, you hear a cry of mortal pain coming from the direction of \$prop(this.wloc). \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) has just been killed, and is now in the Catacombs awaiting resurrection. Type +goto Marrach:rooms:outer:dungeon:NecromanticWorkshop to pay your last respects and field complaints."
"set this.wtime to \$systime :: add 28800 to this.wtime :: set this.death-abort to nil"

"set this.death-abort to nil :: set this.say1 to The east door opens, and Lith enters with her gurney. She curtsies shyly and helps you onto the creaky vehicle, pulling a white sheet up to your chin. :: set this.say1a to You are vaguely aware of the gurney bumping along cold, dark passages, winding its way upward ... :: set this.say2 to The east door opens, and Lith enters with her gurney. She curtsies shyly and helps \$brief(this) onto the creaky vehicle, pulling a white sheet up to \$prop(this.trait:possessive) chin. :: set this.say2a to With a final curtsy, Lith disappears once again, closing the door firmly behind her. :: action for this \$prop(this.say1)\|\$prop(this.say2) :: action for this \$prop(this.say1a)\|\$prop(this.say2a) :: set this.trait:dead to nil :: call bilbo:react:descsub"

"set this.say1 to After a time, Lith helps you off the gurney, and you stand swaying in your old familiar room. :: set this.say1a to With a final curtsy, Lith disappears once again into the depths of the Castle. :: set this.say2 to The door opens, and Lith enters with her gurney. She curtsies shyly, removes a white sheet and helps \$brief(this) to \$prop(this.trait:possessive) feet. :: set this.say2a to With a final curtsy, Lith disappears once again into the depths of the Castle. :: action for this \$prop(this.say1)\|\$prop(this.say2) :: action for this \$prop(this.say1a)\|\$prop(this.say2a)"
